attributes.name: Pantos
attributes.info: I understand that I cannot deposit or withdraw PAN at the moment and that PAN wallets are currently set to trade only (buy and sell).

attributes.maintenance_reason: PAN wallets are in maintenance and currently set to trade only (buy and sell). We are working hard to bring them back online as soon as possible.
attributes.extra_info: If you send the tokens from a smart contract, they will be lost. Please also make sure to use enough gas to fund the transaction to this wallet address.
attributes.info_deu: Ich verstehe, dass ich momentan PAN nicht ein- und auszahlen kann und dass PAN Wallets derzeit auf Trade Only (Kaufen und Verkaufen) eingestellt sind.

attributes.info_fra: Je comprends que je ne peux ni déposer ni retirer des PAN pour le moment et que les PAN wallets sont actuellement uniquement disponibles en trade only (achat et vente).
attributes.info_ita: Sono consapevole che al momento non posso depositare o prelevare l'PAN e che i portafogli dell'PAN sono attualmente impostati per il solo trading (acquisto e vendita).
attributes.info_spa: Entiendo que no puedo hacer depósitos ni retiradas de PAN por el momento y que los monederos PAN están actualmente configurados solamente para realizar transacciones (comprar y vender).
attributes.info_tur: Şu anda PAN yatıramayacağımı ve çekemeyeceğimi ve PAN cüzdanlarının şu anda sadece işlem yapmaya (alım-satım) uygun olduğunu kabul ederim.
attributes.unavailable_reason_deu: PAN Wallets sind auf Trade Only eingestellt (Kaufen und Verkaufen). Bitte habe Geduld, wir werden bald ein komplettes Wallet integrieren, inklusive einer Abhebe- und Sende-Funktion.
attributes.unavailable_reason_eng: PAN wallets are set to trade only (buy and sell). Please be patient, as we will soon be able to offer a full wallet, including a withdrawal and send function.
attributes.unavailable_reason_fra: Les PAN wallets ne sont disponibles qu'en trade only (achat et vente). Un peu de patience, nous pourrons bientôt proposer un full wallet, y compris une fonction de retrait et d'envoi.
attributes.unavailable_reason_ita: I portafogli PAN sono impostati per il solo trading (acquisto e vendita). Si prega di essere pazienti, in quanto saremo presto in grado di offrire un portafoglio completo, comprese le funzioni di prelievo e di invio.
attributes.unavailable_reason_spa: Los monederos PAN únicamente están configurados para realizar transacciones (compra y venta). Pronto vamos a poder ofrecerte un monedero completo, incluyendo una función de retirada y envío.
attributes.unavailable_reason_tur: PAN cüzdanları şu anda trade-only (alım-satım) için ayarlanmıştır.  Lütfen bekleyin, yakında para çekme ve gönderme fonksiyonu dahil tam cüzdan sunacağız.
attributes.maintenance_reason_deu: PAN Wallets befinden sich zur Zeit im Wartungsmodus und sind auf Trade Only (Kaufen und verkaufen) eingestellt. Wir bemühen uns die Wallets so schnell wie möglich wieder online zu bringen.
attributes.maintenance_reason_eng: PAN wallets are in maintenance and currently set to trade only (buy and sell). We are working hard to bring them back online as soon as possible.
attributes.maintenance_reason_fra: Les PAN wallets sont en cours de maintenance et ne sont actuellement disponibles qu'en trade only (achat et vente). Nous mettons tout en œuvre pour les remettre en ligne dès que possible.
attributes.maintenance_reason_ita: I portafogli PAN sono in manutenzione e attualmente sono impostati per il solo trading (acquisto e vendita). Stiamo lavorando duramente per riportarli online il prima possibile.
attributes.maintenance_reason_spa: Los monederos PAN están en mantenimiento y actualmente solo están configurados para realizar transacciones (compra y venta). Estamos trabajando para que vuelvan a estar en línea lo antes posible.
attributes.maintenance_reason_tur: PAN cüzdanları, bakım modunda olup, şu anda sadece işlem yapmaya (alım-satım) uygundur. Mümkün olan en kısa sürede geri getirmeye çalışıyoruz.
attributes.extra_info_deu: Wenn du Token von einem Smart Contract sendest, werden sie verloren gehen. Um diese Transaktion an diese Wallet Adresse durchzuführen, stelle bitte sicher, dass du genug Gas für die Transaktion verwendest.
attributes.extra_info_eng: If you send the tokens from a smart contract, they will be lost. Please also make sure to use enough gas to fund the transaction to this wallet address.
attributes.extra_info_fra: Si vous envoyez des tokens via un smart contract, ils seront perdus. Assurez-vous d'utiliser suffisamment de gas pour effectuer la transaction vers l'adresse de ce wallet.
attributes.extra_info_ita: Se invii i token da uno smart contract, andranno persi. Assicurati anche di avere abbastanza fondi per la transazione a questo indirizzo del portafoglio.
attributes.extra_info_spa: Si envías los Tokens desde un contrato inteligente, se perderán. Asegúrate de llenar el depósito lo suficiente para financiar la transacción a esta dirección de monedero.
attributes.extra_info_tur: Akıllı sözleşme ile token göndermeniz durumunda, tokenler kaybedilecektir. Lütfen bu para yatırma adresini kullanarak işlem yapmak için yeterli bakiyeniz (gas) olduğundan emin olun.

attributes.name: Chainlink
attributes.info: I understand that I cannot deposit or withdraw Chainlink at the moment and that Chainlink wallets are currently set to trade only (buy and sell).
attributes.unavailable_reason: Chainlink wallets are set to trade only (buy and sell). Our Integration Team works closely together with Chainlink to offer you the same seamless experience as with other cryptocurrencies on Bitpanda. Please be patient, as we will soon be able to offer a full wallet, including a withdrawal and send function.
attributes.maintenance_reason: Chainlink wallets are in maintenance and currently set to trade only (buy and sell). We are working hard to bring it back online as soon as possible.
attributes.extra_info: If you send the tokens from a smart contract, they will be lost. Please also make sure to use enough gas to fund the transaction to this wallet address.
attributes.info_deu: Ich verstehe, dass ich momentan Chainlink nicht ein- und auszahlen kann und dass Chainlink Wallets derzeit auf Trade Only (Kaufen und Verkaufen) eingestellt sind.
attributes.info_eng: I understand that I cannot deposit or withdraw Chainlink at the moment and that Chainlink wallets are currently set to trade only (buy and sell).
attributes.info_fra: Je comprends que je ne peux ni déposer ni retirer des Chainlink pour le moment et que les Chainlink wallets ne sont actuellement disponibles qu'en trade only (achat et vente).
attributes.info_ita: Sono consapevole che al momento non posso depositare o prelevare l'Chainlink e che i portafogli dell'Chainlink sono attualmente impostati per il solo trading (acquisto e vendita).
attributes.info_spa: Entiendo que no puedo hacer depósitos ni retiradas de Chainlink por el momento y que los monederos Chainlink están actualmente configurados solamente para realizar transacciones (comprar y vender).
attributes.info_tur: Şu anda Chainlink yatıramayacağımı ve çekemeyeceğimi ve Chainlink cüzdanlarının şu anda sadece işlem yapmaya (alım-satım) uygun olduğunu kabul ederim.
attributes.unavailable_reason_deu: Chainlink (LINK) Wallets sind derzeit auf Trade Only (kaufen und verkaufen) eingestellt. Eine vollständige Wallet Integration inklusive Einzahlungen und Abhebungen wird schon bald folgen. Sobald das vollständige Wallet fertig ist, werden wir dich via Social Media und direkt auf Bitpanda darüber informieren.
attributes.unavailable_reason_eng: Chainlink wallets are set to trade only (buy and sell). Our Integration Team works closely together with Chainlink to offer you the same seamless experience as with other cryptocurrencies on Bitpanda. Please be patient, as we will soon be able to offer a full wallet, including a withdrawal and send function.
attributes.unavailable_reason_fra: Les Chainlink wallets sont disponibles en trade only (achat et vente). Notre équipe d'intégration travaille en étroite collaboration avec Chainlink pour vous offrir la même expérience transparente que pour les autres cryptomonnaies sur Bitpanda. Patience, nous pourrons bientôt proposer un full wallet, y compris une fonction de retrait et d'envoi.
attributes.unavailable_reason_ita: I portafogli Chainlink sono impostati per il solo trading (acquisto e vendita). Il nostro team di integrazione lavora a stretto contatto con la Chainlink Foundation per offrirti la stessa esperienza facilitata di altre criptovalute su Bitpanda. Si prega di essere pazienti, in quanto saremo presto in grado di offrire un portafoglio completo, comprese le funzioni di prelievo e di invio.
attributes.unavailable_reason_spa: Los monederos Chainlink únicamente están configurados para realizar transacciones (compra y venta). Nuestro Equipo de Integración trabaja en estrecha colaboración con Chainlink para ofrecerte la misma experiencia sin interrupciones que con otras criptomonedas en Bitpanda. Pronto vamos a poder ofrecerte un monedero completo, incluyendo una función de retirada y envío.
attributes.unavailable_reason_tur: Chainlink cüzdanları sadece işlem yapmaya (alım-satım) uygundur. Entegrasyon Ekibimiz, size, Bitpanda'da diğer kripto paralar ile aynı kesintisiz deneyimi sunmak için Chainlink ile yakından çalışmaktadır. Yakında, para çekme ve gönderme fonksiyonu dahil, tam cüzdan sunuyor olacağız, lütfen bekleyin.
attributes.maintenance_reason_deu: Chainlink Wallets sind auf Trade Only eingestellt (Kaufen und verkaufen). Bitte habe Geduld, wir werden bald ein komplettes Wallet integrieren, inklusive einer Abhebe- und Sende-Funktion.
attributes.maintenance_reason_eng: Chainlink wallets are in maintenance and currently set to trade only (buy and sell). We are working hard to bring it back online as soon as possible.
attributes.maintenance_reason_fra: Les Chainlink wallets sont en cours de maintenance et ne sont actuellement disponibles qu'en trade only (achat et vente). Nous mettons tout en œuvre pour les remettre en ligne dès que possible.
attributes.maintenance_reason_ita: I portafogli Chainlink sono in manutenzione e attualmente sono impostati per il solo trading (acquisto e vendita). Stiamo lavorando duramente per riportarlo online il prima possibile.
attributes.maintenance_reason_spa: Los monederos Chainlink están en mantenimiento y por el momento solo están configurados para realizar transacciones (compra y venta). Estamos trabajando para volver a tenerlo en línea lo antes posible.
attributes.maintenance_reason_tur: Chainlink cüzdanları, bakım modunda olup, şu anda sadece işlem yapmaya (alım-satım) uygundur. Mümkün olan en kısa sürede geri getirmeye çalışıyoruz.
attributes.extra_info_deu: Wenn du Token von einem Smart Contract sendest, werden sie verloren gehen. Um diese Transaktion an diese Wallet Adresse durchzuführen, stelle bitte sicher, dass du genug Gas für die Transaktion verwendest.
attributes.extra_info_eng: If you send the tokens from a smart contract, they will be lost. Please also make sure to use enough gas to fund the transaction to this wallet address.
attributes.extra_info_fra: Si vous envoyez des tokens via un smart contract, ils seront perdus. Assurez-vous d'utiliser suffisamment de gas pour effectuer la transaction vers l'adresse de ce wallet.
attributes.extra_info_ita: Se invii i token da uno smart contract, andranno persi. Assicurati anche di avere abbastanza fondi per la transazione a questo indirizzo del portafoglio.
attributes.extra_info_spa: Si envías los Tokens desde un contrato inteligente, se perderán. Asegúrate de llenar el depósito lo suficiente para financiar la transacción a esta dirección de monedero.
attributes.extra_info_tur: Akıllı sözleşme ile token göndermeniz durumunda, tokenler kaybedilecektir. Lütfen bu para yatırma adresini kullanarak işlem yapmak için yeterli bakiyeniz (gas) olduğundan emin olun.

attributes.name: Tether
attributes.extra_info: Note that Bitpanda is using the modern ERC20 standard and not OMNI. Also if you send the tokens from a smart contract, they will be lost. Please make sure to use enough gas to fund the transaction to this wallet address.
attributes.info_integration: I understand that this is the ERC20 integration of Tether which can’t be sent to Tether addresses from the Omni protocol.
attributes.extra_info_deu: Beachte, dass Bitpanda den ERC20 Standard verwendet und nicht OMNI. Wenn du Token von einem Smart-Contract sendest, werden sie verloren gehen. Um diese Transaktion zu dieser Wallet Adresse durchzuführen, stelle bitte sicher, dass du genug Gas für die Transaktion verwendest.
attributes.extra_info_eng: Note that Bitpanda is using the modern ERC20 standard and not OMNI. Also if you send the tokens from a smart contract, they will be lost. Please make sure to use enough gas to fund the transaction to this wallet address.
attributes.extra_info_fra: Notez que Bitpanda utilise le standard ERC20 et non pas OMNI. De plus, si vous envoyez des tokens d'un smart contract, ils seront perdus. Assurez-vous d'utiliser suffisamment de gas pour financer la transaction à cette wallet-adresse.
attributes.extra_info_ita: Si noti che Bitpanda utilizza il moderno standard ERC20 e non l'OMNI. Se invii i token da uno smart contract, andranno persi. Assicurati anche di avere abbastanza fondi per la transazione a questo indirizzo di portafoglio.
attributes.extra_info_spa: Ten en cuenta que Bitpanda está usando el estándar ERC20 moderno y no el OMNI. Además, si envías los Tokens de un contrato inteligente, se perderán. Asegúrate de llenar el depósito lo suficiente para financiar la transacción a esta dirección de monedero.
attributes.extra_info_tur: Bitpanda'nın OMNI yerine modern ERC20 standardını kullandığını belirtmek isteriz. Ayrıca, akıllı sözleşme ile token göndermeniz durumunda, tokenler kaybedilecektir. Lütfen bu cüzdan adresinde işlem yapmak için yeterli bakiyeniz (gas) olduğundan emin olun.
attributes.info_integration_deu: Ich verstehe, dass dies die ERC20-Integration von Tether ist, die nicht an Tether-Adressen aus dem Omni-Protokoll gesendet werden kann.
attributes.info_integration_eng: I understand that this is the ERC20 integration of Tether which can’t be sent to Tether addresses from the Omni protocol.
attributes.info_integration_fra: Je comprends qu'il s'agit de l'intégration ERC20 de Tether qui ne peut pas être envoyé aux adresses Tether du protocole Omni.
attributes.info_integration_ita: Sono consapevole che questa è l'integrazione ERC20 di Tether che non può essere inviata agli indirizzi Tether dal protocollo Omni.
attributes.info_integration_spa: Entiendo que esta es la integración ERC20 de Tether que no se puede enviar a las direcciones Tether desde el protocolo Omni.
attributes.info_integration_tur: Omni protokolünden Tether adreslerine gönderilemeyen Tether'in ERC20 entegrasyonu olduğunu kabul ederim.

attributes.extra_info_deu: Aufgrund der Art der IOTA-Technologie kannst du jede IOTA-Adresse nur einmal für eine einzige Einzahlung verwenden. Erstelle nach jeder Verwendung eine neue Adresse.

attributes.extra_info: Please use the destination tag when depositing to this address. Without the destination tag, the amount won't be credited to your account.

attributes.extra_info_tur: Bu adrese para yatırırken lütfen hedef etiketini kullanın. Hedef etiketi olmadan, miktar hesabınıza yatırılamaz.

attributes.unavailable_reason_deu: XLM Wallets sind auf Trade Only eingestellt (Kaufen und Verkaufen). Unser Integration Team arbeitet eng mit der XLM Foundation zusammen, um dir den gleichen Komfort wie bei anderen Kryptowährungen auf Bitpanda zu bieten. attributes.unavailable_reason_eng: XLM wallets are set to trade only (buy and sell). attributes.unavailable_reason_fra: Les XLM wallets sont disponibles en trade only (achat et vente). Notre équipe d'intégration travaille en étroite collaboration avec la Fondation XLM pour vous offrir la même expérience transparente que pour les autres cryptomonnaies sur Bitpanda. Patience, nous pourrons bientôt proposer un full wallet, y compris une fonction de retrait et d'envoi.
attributes.unavailable_reason_ita: I portafogli XLM sono impostati per il solo trading (acquisto e vendita). Il nostro team di integrazione lavora a stretto contatto con la XLM Foundation per offrirti la stessa esperienza facilitata di altre criptovalute su Bitpanda. Si prega di essere pazienti, in quanto saremo presto in grado di offrire un portafoglio completo, comprese le funzioni di prelievo e di invio.
attributes.unavailable_reason_spa: Los monederos XLM únicamente están configurados para realizar transacciones (compra y venta). Nuestro Equipo de Integración trabaja en estrecha colaboración con la Fundación XLM para ofrecerte la misma experiencia sin interrupciones que con otras criptomonedas en Bitpanda. Pronto vamos a poder ofrecerte un monedero completo, incluyendo una función de retirada y envío.
attributes.unavailable_reason_tur: XLM cüzdanları sadece işlem yapmaya (alım-satım) uygundur. Yakında, para çekme ve gönderme fonksiyonu dahil, tam cüzdan sunuyor olacağız, lütfen bekleyin.

attributes.maintenance_reason: We only credit Bitcoin Cash (ABC) coins sent to Bitpanda. Deposited Bitcoin Cash (SV) coins will be lost.
attributes.extra_info: We only credit Bitcoin Cash (ABC) coins sent to Bitpanda. Deposited Bitcoin Cash (SV) coins will be lost. If your deposit address is not recognised, try leaving "bitcoincash:" out. Should your wallet not accept the "Cash Address" format, convert your BCH address to the "Legacy" format.

attributes.extra_info_deu: Es werden nur Bitcoin Cash (ABC) Coins gutgeschrieben. Einzahlungen von Bitcoin Cash (SV) Coins gehen verloren. attributes.extra_info_eng: We only credit Bitcoin Cash (ABC) coins sent to Bitpanda. Deposited Bitcoin Cash (SV) coins will be lost. attributes.unavailable_reason_deu: Basic Attention Token sind auf Trade Only eingestellt (Kaufen und Verkaufen). Unser Integration Team arbeitet eng mit der Basic Attention Token Foundation zusammen, um dir den gleichen Komfort wie bei anderen Kryptowährungen auf Bitpanda zu bieten. Bitte habe Geduld, wir werden bald ein komplettes Wallet integrieren, inklusive einer Abhebe- und Sende-Funktion.
attributes.unavailable_reason_eng: Basic Attention Token wallets are set to trade only (buy and sell). Our Integration Team works closely together with the Basic Attention Token Foundation to offer you the same seamless experience as with other cryptocurrencies on Bitpanda. Please be patient, as we will soon be able to offer a full wallet, including a withdrawal and send function.
attributes.unavailable_reason_fra: Les Basic Attention Token wallets sont disponibles en trade only (achat et vente). Notre équipe d'intégration travaille en étroite collaboration avec la Fondation Basic Attention Token pour vous offrir la même expérience transparente que pour les autres cryptomonnaies sur Bitpanda. Patience, nous pourrons bientôt proposer un full wallet, y compris une fonction de retrait et d'envoi.
attributes.unavailable_reason_ita: I portafogli Basic Attention Token sono impostati per il solo trading (acquisto e vendita). Il nostro team di integrazione lavora a stretto contatto con la Basic Attention Token Foundation per offrirti la stessa esperienza facilitata di altre criptovalute su Bitpanda. Si prega di essere pazienti, in quanto saremo presto in grado di offrire un portafoglio completo, comprese le funzioni di prelievo e di invio.
attributes.unavailable_reason_spa: Los monederos Basic Attention Token únicamente están configurados para realizar transacciones (compra y venta). Nuestro Equipo de Integración trabaja en estrecha colaboración con la Fundación Basic Attention Token para ofrecerte la misma experiencia sin interrupciones que con otras criptomonedas en Bitpanda. Pronto vamos a poder ofrecerte un monedero completo, incluyendo una función de retirada y envío.
attributes.unavailable_reason_tur: Basic Attention Token cüzdanları sadece işlem yapmaya (alım-satım) uygundur. Entegrasyon Ekibimiz, size, Bitpanda'da diğer kripto paralar ile aynı kesintisiz deneyimi sunmak için Basic Attention Token Vakfı ile yakından çalışmaktadır. Yakında, para çekme ve gönderme fonksiyonu dahil, tam cüzdan sunuyor olacağız, lütfen bekleyin.
